#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define SF(x)	scanf("%d", &x)
#define PF(x)	printf("%d", x)
#define psp     printf(" ")
#define pnl     printf("\n")
#define charint(c) ((c)-'0')
#define pii pair< int, int >
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define test int t; scanf("%d",&t);while(t--)
#define forall(a,b) for(long long i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define clr(x) x.clear()
#define sz(x) ((int)(x).size())
#define abs(a) ((a)>(0)?(a):(-a))
#define bit(x,i)          (x&(1<<i))  //select the bit of position i of x
#define lowbit(x)         ((x)&((x)^((x)-1))) 
#define higbit(x)         (1 << ( int) log2(x) )
#define countleadzero(x)  __builtin_ctz(x) //in its binary representation ex. when x=8 answer is 3
#define countsetbits(x)   ____builtin_popcount(x) //count no of setbits
#define gcd(a,b)   __gcd(a,b)
#define bss binary_search
#define esort(x)        (sort((x).begin(), (x).end()))
#define ersort(x)       (sort((x).rbegin(), (x).rend()))
#define MAX		100050
#define INF		1e9
#define mod     1000000007
#define fi first
#define se second
typedef long long 		ll;
typedef unsigned long long	ull;
int z[8000000];
char s[8000000];
void func(){
	int l=0,r=0;
	int n=strlen(s);
	forall(0,n-1){
		if(i>r){
			l=r=i;
			while(r<n&&s[r]==s[r-l])
			r++;
			z[i]=r-l;
			r--;
		}
		else{
			int k=i-l;
			int b=r-i+1;
			if(z[k]<b)
			z[i]=z[k];
			else{
				l=i;
				while(r<n&&s[r]==s[r-l])
			r++;
			z[i]=r-l;
			r--;
			}
		}
	}
}
int main(){
scanf("%s",s);
func();
int q;
SF(q);
while(q--){
	int k;
	SF(k);
	if(k<z[k])
	PF(k);
	else
	PF(z[k]);
	pnl;
}
}
